title: Oscilloscope Capture of DAC Output and Modulation
summary: A Rigol oscilloscope screenshot showing two traces: a lower-frequency yellow waveform and a higher-frequency cyan waveform. On-screen measurements indicate approximately 1.00 Hz and 3.01 Hz frequencies.

structured_data.description: Rigol UI screenshot with CH1 (yellow) and CH2 (cyan). Timebase appears 200 ms/div. Measurement panel shows CH1 around 1.00 Hz and CH2 around 3.01 Hz, with CH1 around 500 mV/div and CH2 around 112 mV/div displayed at the bottom.
